form.label: File Prevalence Overview
form.description: This dashboard looks for the occurrence of a file hash based on the Sysmon data within the selected timeframe.

search.query: `sysmon` (event_id=1 OR event_id=7 OR event_id=15 OR event_id=25) (hash_md5=$hash$ OR hash_sha1=$hash$ OR hash_sha256=$hash$) | eval dllname=case(event_id=7,replace(ImageLoaded,"(.*\\\)(?=.*(\.\w*)$|(\w+)$)","")) | eval filename=case(event_id=1,process_name,event_id=7,dllname,(event_id=15 OR event_id=25),file_name) | stats dc(host_fqdn) as Prevalence by filename,hash_sha1,hash_sha256,hash_md5,hash_imphash | table Prevalence

`sysmon` (event_id=1 OR event_id=7 OR event_id=15 OR event_id=25) (hash_md5=$hash$ OR hash_sha1=$hash$ OR hash_sha256=$hash$) | eval dllname=case(event_id=7,replace(ImageLoaded,"(.*\\\)(?=.*(\.\w*)$|(\w+)$)","")) | eval filename=case(event_id=1,process_name,event_id=7,dllname,(event_id=15 OR event_id=25),file_name) | stats count(_time) as Frequency by filename,hash_sha1,hash_sha256,hash_md5,hash_imphash | table Frequency

`sysmon` (event_id=1 OR event_id=7 OR event_id=15 OR event_id=25) (hash_md5=$hash$ OR hash_sha1=$hash$ OR hash_sha256=$hash$) | eval dllname=case(event_id=7,replace(ImageLoaded,"(.*\\\)(?=.*(\.\w*)$|(\w+)$)","")) | eval filename=case(event_id=1,process_name,event_id=7,dllname,(event_id=15 OR event_id=25),file_name) | stats dc(filename) as Filenames by hash_sha1,hash_sha256,hash_md5 | table Filenames

table.title: First time observed (looks in threathunting_file_summary index)

search.query: `threathunting_file_summary_index` earliest=0 (hash_sha1=$hash$ OR hash_sha256=$hash$) filename=$file_name$ | eval FirstSeen=strftime(FirstSeen, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S") | table FirstSeen,file_name,host_fqdn,user_name,event_type,file_company,file_signature,file_is_signed,hash_sha256,hash_sha1,hash_imphash

`sysmon` (event_id=1 OR event_id=7 OR event_id=15 OR event_id=25) (hash_md5=$hash$ OR hash_sha1=$hash$ OR hash_sha256=$hash$) | eval dllname=case(event_id=7,replace(ImageLoaded,"(.*\\\)(?=.*(\.\w*)$|(\w+)$)","")) | eval filename=case(event_id=1,process_name,event_id=7,dllname,(event_id=15 OR event_id=25),file_name)| table _time,host_fqdn,user_name,process_name,original_file_name,process_command_line,file_company,file_description, process_parent_name, process_parent_command_line

table.title: Additional files with the same Import Hash (slow)

search.query: `sysmon` (event_id=1 OR event_id=7 OR event_id=15 OR event_id=25) [search `sysmon` (event_id=1 OR event_id=7 OR event_id=15 OR event_id=25) (hash_md5=$hash$ OR hash_sha1=$hash$ OR hash_sha256=$hash$) | table hash_imphash | dedup hash_imphash ] | eval dllname=case(event_id=7,replace(ImageLoaded,"(.*\\\)(?=.*(\.\w*)$|(\w+)$)","")) | eval filename=case(event_id=1,process_name,event_id=7,dllname,(event_id=15 OR event_id=25),file_name) | stats values(hash_imphash) by filename, hash_sha256
